Key Match Events: Tyrese Haliburton recorded a triple-double with 33 points and 15 assists
Pascal Siakam had 18 points and 11 rebounds
Kel’el Ware led the Heat with 25 points
Miami was within 14 early in the third, before the Pacers got six points in 30 seconds to go up 78-58 with 8:08 left in that quarter
Pre-Game Insights: Jimmy Butler scored nine points, and didn’t play in the fourth quarter for a second consecutive night
Post-Match Reflections: Miami was within 14 early in the third, before the Pacers got six points in 30 seconds to go up 78-58 with 8:08 left in that quarter
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pacers made 17 3-pointers and are now 8-2 this season when connecting at least 15 times from beyond the arc
They're 5-10 this season in games where they made 12 or fewer from 3-point range
Thursday was the 25th anniversary of Miami's first game at what is now called Kaseya Center
